If I was starting a football team in a national budget league, I'd pick Paul Ryan as the captain and quarterback, said Sen. Bernie Sanders Dan Lungren ( R., Calif.), an ally of the late Mr. Jack Kemp . "There's nobody in this House who's taken as serious a long-term view on the budget as Paul Ryan."
